links.title: Musk Says Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) Would Be More Efficient Off The Market - Here's Why That Makes Sense
links.description: The pressure of being answerable to multiple stakeholders and shareholders is apparently weighing on Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk. Tesla might be better off as a private company, Musk said in a recent interview with Rolling Stone's Neil Strauss. "I wish we could be private with Tesla," Musk said.

links.description: By MarketWatch rounded up 10 of its most interesting topics over the past week. 1.
